on reading compounds: 垢衣【コウイ】dirty clothes, grimy clothes
垢膩【コウジ】dirt and grease, filth, grime
垢【ク】klesha (polluting thoughts such as greed, hatred and delusion, which result in suffering)
垢膩【コウジ】dirt and grease, filth, grime
純粋無垢【ジュンスイムク】pure and innocent, immaculate
kun reading compounds: 垢【あか】dirt, filth, grime, account (e.g. online service)
垢掻き【あかかき】female assistant who scrubbed customers at public baths and also offered sexual services (Edo period)
鍵垢【かぎあか】private account (esp. on Twitter), account on a social networking service that can only be viewed by approved followers
